## Question 1. Data Visualization - First Steps

Load the following data.frame, `mpg`.
```{r}
#| echo: true
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
mpg <- ggplot2::mpg
```


```{r}

            options = list(rows.print = 10,
```

### Q1c.
Make a scatterplot of `hwy` vs. `cyl`.

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = hwy, y = cyl))
```

<br>
